title: Study Space WiFi
content: So the study space next to the cafeteria in RR Campus has some WiFi provided, but it has some password protection...could a senior please explain how I could access this WiFi?

comments.body: Access the captive portal first (it should automatically load it once you connect to the WiFi). Username and password both are your SRN. If these credentials do not work it means your SRNs haven't probably been added into the system yet. Try using any senior's credentials (replace the UG22 with UG21 or something else).

Sure, I'll give it a go:)  


Thanks a lot:D
What will be the fees for cse if we join pes through pessat &hostel fees in EC campus?
